english.segment1: This is my prayer, this is my cry, stay with me, stay with me. When all my world is at your feet
english.segment2: You are the only one worth waiting for, worth waiting for. So I will pray and pray that you'll never stop haunting me. You are the only one worth waiting for, worth waiting for. So I get on my knees and cry out to you, oh don't be silent anymore.
english.segment3: Where is the voice that could break this stillness, speak to me, speak to me. That I might find you in the silent, speak to me, speak to me. When all my world is at your feet. I have said all I needed to say, wanted to say, how long will it take, how long will it take
